summary: Second iteration comprehensive testing of Discord Radio Bot hosting service completed successfully. All backend APIs functional, frontend components working perfectly with German interface, 4 bots with colored invite buttons, 11 stations with proper genres, search/filter functionality, and complete integration testing passed 100%.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/health returns ok:true with status and timestamp
Backend API /api/bots returns 4 bots with proper data structure and totals
Backend API /api/stations returns 11 stations with proper genres (Electronic/Festival, Lo-Fi/Chill, Dance/EDM, etc)
Backend API /api/stats returns aggregated statistics including station count (4 bots, 11 stations)
Backend API /api/commands returns all 10 slash commands (/play, /pause, /resume, /stop, etc)
Frontend Hero section displays German title 'Dreh die Lautstärke auf' correctly
Frontend Hero section shows quick stats (Server, Stationen, Bots) properly
Frontend Bot directory displays 4 bot cards with colored invite buttons (cyan, green, pink, amber)
Frontend Bot invite buttons contain proper Discord OAuth URLs and are clickable
Frontend Copy button functionality works for bot invitation URLs
Frontend Station browser shows all 11 stations with search functionality
Frontend Station search input filters stations correctly (tested with 'lofi' search)
Frontend Genre filter buttons work perfectly (12 filters including 'Alle')
Frontend Genre filtering shows correct stations (Electronic/Festival filter tested)
Frontend Commands section displays all 10 slash commands in terminal-style interface
Frontend Stats footer displays 5 statistics (Server, Nutzer, Verbindungen, Zuhörer, Stationen)
Frontend Navigation links (4 links) scroll to correct sections
Frontend Station genres are proper categories, not just 'Radio'
Frontend Stations have correct genre tags like 'Electronic / Festival', 'Lo-Fi / Chill', 'Dance / EDM', etc
Frontend Bot status indicators show 'Konfigurierbar' for offline bots
Frontend German language interface throughout all components
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (5/5 endpoints), Frontend: 100% (all components and interactions)
